mapper.select: select * from lodge L inner join room R on L.lodge_no=R.lodge_no inner join lodge_addr A on L.lodge_no=A.lodge_no where L.lodge_no=#{param1} and R.room_no=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (reser_no, reser_name, check_in, check_out, visit_type, payment_type, payment_price, lodge_no, member_no, room_no) values(reservation_no_seq.nextval, #{reser_name}, to_date(#{check_in},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{check_out},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{visit_type}, #{payment_type}, #{payment_price}, #{lodge_no}, #{member_no}, #{room_no})
mapper.update: update member set m_point=#{param1} where member_no=#{param2}
